Most Illustrious Sir  
Piratini, December 12, 1838.

By the Treasury Court, as has been decided today by this Department, orders will be issued so that the Collector of Bagé accepts all drafts by Your Excellency of the 3rd of the current month.

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, December 12, 1838.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.  
Domingos José de Almeida
